description: Listed only by Irwin, who says: �A short-resonatored Reed of 16', 8', or 4' on either manuals or pedals, making a soft but brilliant reedy timbre, sometimes very metallic as well, useful in flue combinations.�
examplesDescription: Dulzian Regal 16', Choir; St. Mark's Episcopal Church, Palo Alto, California, USA; Casavant 1957-64.
